description.@en: No matter what anyone needs from me, I can always find it in a moment—for the right price, of course.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail a Guile or Intimidate Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to resell illegal wares & weapons.
